location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Merewether, Khoob near Kusmoor [Kusmaur], to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: The folio has been turned horizontally for the postscripts to be written on the verso of it.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's route to Kelat [Kalat], recommending the shortest routes to Jacobabad and making arrangements for telegraphs to await him en route.The letter also discusses Merewether's work and his hope of being back at Jacobabad by 20 December.
